articles.title: Ukrainian nuclear plant operating in emergency mode, state operator says - CBC News
articles.description: Europe's largest nuclear power plant embroiled in Russia's war in Ukraine is operating in emergency mode at a higher level of risk, Ukraine's state nuclear energy operator said Friday.
articles.content:
Europe's largest nuclear power plant embroiled in Russia's war in Ukraine is operating in emergency mode at a higher level of risk, Ukraine's state nuclear energy operator said Friday.

articles.title: FEI Board Approves Temporary Measures in View of Vaccine Shortage - | Eurodressage
articles.description: The FEI Board has approved a temporary exemption to the FEI Veterinary Regulations in response to the shortage of vaccines in Europe created by supply issues facing Boehringer Ingelheim, a key producer of equine influenza vaccinations.
